globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https://*.auth0.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.googletagmanager.com https://*.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.auth0.com https://*.google-analytics.com https://*.googletagmanager.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.auth0.com;
